p: According to the Pan American Health Organization reports, the vector-borne diseases are ordered by frequency and prevalence in the following manner: 1 st place dengue, with cases in almost all of the countries of the American region; 2 nd chikungunya; 3 rd zika, which is then followed by Malaria, Chagas, Leishmaniasis and Yellow fever (PAHO-CHA-IR, 2016[ 57]).
